snippet: At least seven Colombian soldiers were killed and five others were wounded in a battle with rebels who tried to seize a town on Wednesday, the military said.
abstract: Colombian military says at least seven soldiers were killed and five others wounded in battle with Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia rebels.
lead_paragraph: At least seven Colombian soldiers were killed and five others were wounded in a battle with rebels who tried to seize a town on Wednesday, the military said.

headline.main: Colombia: Soldiers Die in Rebel Fight
headline.print_headline: Colombia: Soldiers Die in Rebel Fight
